home.start_with_template: Start with one of our customs templates
home.connect_services: Connect to the services below to access Actions and Reactions

templates.1: Receive mail when temperature hits a certain level
templates.3: Add a new task in Microsoft To-Do when a commit is made on GitHub
templates.4: Send a Teams message when a commit is made on GitLab
templates.5: Add an event in Google Calendar with last hour news
templates.6: Add temperature in Google Doc when it is lower than a certain level
templates.7: Add a note in Microsoft Note when precipitations are higher than a certain level
